system.description:
At 6th level you master a technique passed down through countless generations of druids. Choose one of the following:

Harvest Boon

You learn the druidic rituals of vitality that have ensured generations of bountiful harvests. You always have the spell Plant Growth prepared and it doesnâ€™t count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. You may also Plant Growth without expending a spell slot when casting the spell using the Enlarged option.
